title: Issues with installing the module
body:
Hi Michael,

I have been trying to install RNAaliSplit on my ubuntu 16.04  laptop. Unfortunately it's challenging because of the dependencies I guess. It would be really great if you could offer a bioconda package for the tool. This should resolve the issues with dependencies, since viennarna, rnaz and rscape are already available in bioconda channel.

Using the cpan installer currently it fails at this step. :

```
#   Failed test 'use Bio::RNA::RNAaliSplit::WrapRNAz;'
#   at t/00-load.t line 14.
#     Tried to use 'Bio::RNA::RNAaliSplit::WrapRNAz'.
```
